changelog.change: Updated the autosplitter to support LiveSplit 1.6.
Added checkbox to include splits that don't actually split.

Added an "In Game" split to split when reentering the game. Combined with the above, a skill such as "Wall Jump" can be marked "Don't Split" followed by an "In Game" split to split when you re-enter the game after getting an ability rather than splitting immediately on pickup.
Updated the default splits for all categories to reflect route changes.
Added new All Skills category along with default splits.

Changed the default `Iceless` split to be higher to avoid false splits. You will need to manually update your splits changing them from `Iceless` to something else and then back to `Iceless` to effect this change.
Ignore skip split commands from LiveSplit. Previously it tried to advance its internal state to allow skipping buggy splits, however, due to stability this now is often the wrong behavior.
